paper_abstract: In [1], Carlitz introduced q-extension of Bernoulli numbers and polynomials and Kim gave the Witt's formula for the Carlitz's q-Bernoulli numbers and polynomials(see [7, 8]). In this paper we consider the modified q-Bernoulli numbers and polynomials which are slightly different Carlitz's q-Bernoulli numbers and polynomials.
paper_title: A NOTE ON THE MODIFIED CARLITZ'S q-BERNOULLI NUMBERS AND POLYNOMIALS
